content: Doesn't even work. And I can't get a refund.
Yes!!! I've been waiting for the mobile version forever!!! Played sooooo many hours on PC!

I haven't a clue how to play this game apart from slicing up the ice. As for the two finger exercise, that seems about right! And no updates for several years so the developers can't be too interested in their product. How they got their rave reviews is beyond me. Waste of money. Uninstalling.

Hi team, Why is this still not available for full screen? Can you please make this happen? To gamers - Other than that...the puzzles are very intuitive and timing is very important to complete all the side objectives of a level...at first there is a learning curve, once you have passed that...still it would take 2-3 tries to complete a single level (sometimes even more than that) I am expecting that nitrome team would add more levels considering the price of the game
I seriously love this game... But I wish it was ported to PC. I wish all Nitrome games were ported to PC. I'd buy them all.
I prefer not to have microtransactions in an app I paid for. I especially don't like being asked to buy microtransactions constantly in an app I paid for.
This would be a 5-star game if I could pinch to zoom

Last I play was on website. Fun game to play. But bad graphic . Probably it was design for older Android. I am using oneplus7t. Game still playable but the graphic just not too pleasant. It will greatly improve the experience if something can be done about the graphic.
Trash

I would love to give the game 1 star, but because I have been playing for years, and because overall it's fun, I'm tossing in the extra star. Why, then, would I love to only give it 1 star? Because I PAID FOR THE GAME, and therefore I shouldn't have to pay extra for god items, on top of no ads. Shame on me for not reading more clearly that there were in-app purchases...and shame on the developers for making us pay extra for in-game items.
It won't zoom to fit the screen. As a result, I can't see anything. It also says the app is too old for my device... which is a Google Pixel XL. So it's basically an unplayable Angry Birds knockoff.
Not as xcited as i tot...tho its a good game but its outdated.tq
Great game, very fun to play, but the game has not been kept updated. My phone no longer supports the game which is a shame. If the game could be updated that'd be great.
Loved the online series, glad to find it here.
Purchased game hoping it would be as good as nitrome's web flash version. It isnt... Also hoped that paid for games wouldn't have ads in them, or in game purchases... Wouldn't buy again

It's alright until it becomes too difficult with the par system. Then, even if you beat the level, you can't proceed in the game. I have given this game 2 chances but since it is way too difficult in higher levels, I will give this one a miss.
An awesome game! Only problem is that there isn't more of it!

Amazing, addictive and overall a very good game. Too bad it probably hasn't been optimized since 2014. Loading screens on my Galaxy S7 are displayed in a tiny window in the bottom right corner of the display and the framerate is far from consistent.

In my opinion, this is the best browser-mobile port nitrome has ever made. A great main story, good gameplay and graphics, and lots of optional side quests. I don't care i had to pay for it, it's worth every cent.

played this game a long time ago and nitrome still makes the best flash games. more bought the game to support because I spent so much time on this seeing the ways you could win. Appreciate the adventures
hell yuh
A good game waited to be found
One of the first mobile games I ever bought :p love it
Developers don't answer emails when charged for iaps that you haven't ordered. Avoid.
Its ice breaker all right. But it isnt the icebreaker I fell in love with.

I loved the icebreaker games online and was thrilled to see this on android. I've got par on every single level up to caviar on the kraken levels. Watched YouTube videos to try to help me out, still can't get the viking on the left to the boat in only 1 cut. Would rate higher if this was fixed. I usually play this game until I hit this level, try it for days, yes days, can't beat it and start another game, don't think I've even finished due to the caviar level.
Excellent game, everything great about nitrome
Great game
Nitro always makes great games.
Fun once you get the hand of it
Nice puzzler
It freezes upon opening the app, can't play it at all.
Awesome !

Some small things that would make the gaming experience much better: 1.Sometimes when I complete rescue my last viking, a chest lands on the boat, but I don't get any credit for it (probably <1 sec between the guy and the chest landing).I feel like there should be some condition where the level waits for all items on the boat to be opened before finishing.2. I would like a reset button on the level screen.Tapping the settings every time you want to reset the level is annoying. 3. Simpler scrolling. Thanks!
Nice style and graphic, good story, and awesome levels. Try this game ;-)
Wonderful game; well worth the price
well designed game, cute storyline. highly polished with interesting machanics and a load of character. Good time waster and at times makes you think. Well worth the money

The game doesn't treat me as though I am mentally retarded. It understands what it is and does what it does perfectly. The gameplay provides a challenge, the visuals are very nice and creative and the level design is thought through. Love the fact that the game is beatable without any microtransactions without hours of stupid grinding. Oh and by the way, check out the app's permissions...this is how an application is programmed on a mobile device people!
This puzzle game has more levels, more plot, more humor, and more fun. Some of the puzzles were easy to solve instantly and some required days to solve.
I loved playing this game and the other versions at well, i think it would awsome if more levels were added and some of the other types of ice also

I've been a nitrome fan since you guys first made roly poly, scibble, and feed me. I played the original ice breaker years ago and this version is even better. This is an awesome game, keep up the great work and thanks for all the fun games over the years!
Insulting  A classic ruined by greedy practices.  Microtransactions in an up-front charged game? No thanks.
Cool!

I like the game play, but simple is better. Things start off fun, slicing up ice to save the Vikings. But as the game progresses the puzzles seem to have less ice slicing and more gimmicky complicated contraptions to maneuver. All of it works, just could be spread out over more levels.  If you like angry birds and bad piggies give this a shot.
Not bad
But where is that 8 bit music that Nitrome is famous for...
Can't beat level 3. Whenever I try to use 2 fingers it won't do anything.
I really loved this game when I played browser version love that they expanded it with so many stages.
good
The game is good :D
Great game. Hope u guys make more levels for us to play :)

I've played this game on a PC and the mobile ap is almost identical. My Samsung GALAXY 5 phone runs slow and freezes a lot since I installed this game. If the screen times out while I'm playing, the game doesn't start up again immediately. Too many glitches to make the game worthwhile.

I finished every single level of this (great) game except Caviar. This level is impossible on both Galaxy Nexus and Nexus 6. I tried the solution now available on YouTube but the behaviour is different and the vicking always fall on the electrified surface.

Every few failed attempts at a level (about no more than 6), it will put a button notification in front of the screen to advertise their micro-transaction shop. Theres no option to disable it and its irritating. Thats not ok in a puzzle game that isn't free. 3/5 for this and inconsistant physics. There is a great game beyond these issues here though :)
Niveles retadores

Nitrome can always be counted on to deliver a quality game. This is no exception! Good puzzle gameplay, and elements such as the 'par' score, challenges, and coins that are just out of reach give good replay value. The jokes are a little cheesy, but in a so-bad-it's-good sort of way. My only complaint is with the load times; it feels like there could be some optimisation. Very good over all, though!

Doesn't retroactively complete Google Play achievements, e.g. I unlocked achievements in the game before signing into Google Play, and the game did not sync the already completed achievements with the achievements in Google Play.
As expected from nitrome.
Have no music! Uninstalled, reinstalled and still no music! Please fix...

When this first debuted on Android and constantly crash my tablet. However since the update I have seen vast improvements. My only complaint is that with a game like this trial and error is a given so I find it annoying to advertise for in app purchases if I wanted them I'd buy them and it doesn't help there's no way to get them besides using real money like in angry birds.
I'm not getting any achievements despite meeting their goals! Fix please
Its good but the controls are really awkward. Update: and the shop doesn't work
This game looks like a lot of fun,  unfortunately it doesn't seem to work. It froze going in, pausing, opening level select, didn't read input. ..I gave up
I love everything about this game
THIS GAME.... OMG, THIS GAME, OMG, THIS GAME,,, RITE UP THERE‚§¥... IS JUST,,,OMG.... THIS GAME OMG!!!

Its too bad because I really enjoy the music in this game. Will change to 5 stars if I can get some help here!  Edit: no updates as of yet and still no music on lg nexus 5. Real shame.
Awesome game
I will gladly adjust my rating if this game receives. That feature

Absolutely love this!! The game mechanic is great, and whilst not the most unique, the way it's used, the style of the graphics and the characters and setting are superb!  Also love the fact you've made it paid for, and we don't NEED to buy in app purchases.  We need more devs doing this!!

The premise is simple: cut ice blocks, let physics do the rest. Dont let that fool you though - this game is devious: mostly your vikings get spiked, eaten, drowned, stuck or sacrificed to temple gods.
Fun game. One problem, though is the fact that the store they're constantly pestering you about doesn't even work.
Great game. Buy it!
The game is mostly simple, and I have, and will continue to lose time playing it.
Very fun,cute graphics, and challenging. Worth the money. üòä
Lots of humor and some really good levels! Totally worth your money
Lots of fun.
I think it thinks my note 4 is a tablet. In tutorial level it tells me how to scroll but i am zoomed. Everything is just to small. Shame really i wad looking forward to playing it.
Addictive
I could not stop playing. The bad part is that it freezes on the loading screen and does not start until my phone is restarted
Perfection
Cute story
Best game I have ever played !!!!!
I was playing it one day, the next day it starts to open but as soon as it gets to the very first loading screen the app just closes. Almost a week now. Remind me again why I paid for this?
Play it all the time. Just a little request though: can you allow backups via helium so I can restore progress on my new phone
Nitrome delivers on mobile with an updated Icebreaker. Played uninterrupted for an entire 4 hour flight. Also good for quick sessions. Few games can strike this balance.
Awesome
Butt but takes long to install
Love this game. Just waiting for more levels.
Nitrome always has good quality games.  I always look for their games online when I want to play something that's simple, yet extremely fun.  Good game and thanks for bringing this to Android.
The best mobile game made ever!

Loads of time wasting fun. Only issue is the occasional crash but one of the best games out there.
ALL HAIL THE KING!

replyContent: If you could email us at support@nitrome.com with a screenshot of your 'about phone' page in settings then we will look into why it is not working for you and make a fix. We do not want anyone to have problems with our apps if we can help it.

content: This is one of the best games I've ever played. The originality is amazing and definitely worth a go.
Good fun, but frequently crashes.

i love this game. There are so many maps, and i really like how you've added all the characters with speech bubbles. The music is good, and the graphics are amazing. Nitrome makes the best games and if you're thinking of buying it, go for it! It's amazing!
I downloaded this app for my Nexus 7 and every time I try to start it, it will say "unfortunately, icebreaker has stopped". Please fix.
Fun, but the IAP suggestions are annoying.

Great, smart game, and 100% of the levels are playable, and beatable without IAP's.   The "content" is only special nonsense items that are not at all necessary to beat any levels.  I have been playing this game for about a month, and no complaints.
Nitrome!!!!!!
This game is great till you reach the Kracken levels. Then you no longer break ice and break tiny fish eggs. Gets tedious and boring. Deleting
So I doesnt work unless im online?  I live in a country I cant do that!!!  Waste of money
Game is promising but force-closes in 2012 version of Nexus 7 (non-rooted and os updated)

I still remember clearly when I discovered Hot Air on Miniclip in 2006 and from there found Nitrome, since that day I have been a fan of your guys'  games.  Nitrome was a huge part of my childhood, my best friend and I would play on your site basically every night after school, taking it in turns on Feedme. and Twang. Ever since you announced they were working on Super Feedme for iOS I had been waiting for you to release one of your games to a mobile platform. By the time Ice Breaker for iOS was released I had switched to Android. Thank you so much for making this game.

It's okay if you're Waldo in a bathtub. You may need ketchup for the donkey riders though. I enjoyed the silver monkey statues, although the hot dog decree from Uranus rustled my jimmies to the crunch.
Different, keeps u hooked.
Never started on my Nexus 7. Keeps saying Unfortunately, Icebreaker has stopped.
The orientation is locked. Why can't I both have 90 and 270 degrees orientation? Please consider fixing this.
Used to play the original online about 6 years ago and was so happy to this this in the app store. Just played it for 1 Hour straight.

Great game with elements of humor & puzzle solving. Overall found the game enjoyable. If you're someone who likes to 100% a game you'll find few achievements are almost impossible and leave you wanting to throw your phone.

It's a fun and creative little game with an interesting storyline. It's challenging and just as amusing as Angry Birds and Tiny Thief. Overall, it's an amazing game.  I'm rating it 4 stars because I found zooming in and out and up and down a tad difficult. I believe the game would benefit by including a slider bar on the side to move the screen up and down.
Very good little strategy game this. Funny, atmospheric and great depth for the price.
Purchase are too costly, makes some levels aggravating without them
Varied and ingenious

Can't play on my LG G2.  Update: I figured out the issue. When I try to start it from portrait mode, the game struggles and for some reason can't turn to landscape mode by itself. It will either crash outright or start up with half of the screen black. When I start it from landscape mode it seems to be fine.   Good job, Nitrome.

Easy enough just to beat a level, challenging to get par or under par. IAPs are a minor distraction. Annoying that there is neither cloud save nor data backup for apps like Carbon! Update: to copy save data to another device, copy save.xml and achievements.xml from /data/data/com.nitrome.icebreaker . You need root access and a root-compatible file browser like Total Commander.
Not paid a penny of real money and enjoying the game, nice balance of gameplay vs need to pay to win. Already in the belly of the Kracken

Excellent
Didnt enjoy playing it. Can I get a refund please.

Great game,  Hugh Janus
Most fun I've had in a long time on my phone. The game is smart, challenging and long.
Game is fun, without a doubt but what kind of self respecting developer throws in ad's? what a letdown.

This game is very enjoyable, filled with missions and challenges. The basic idea is very simple, but the hilarious story, charming graphics an constantly tweaked mechanics make this game probably the best purchase i have done on google play store.

Good puzzles, length and art but some really annoying problems with the game programming e.g. if your vikings happen to hit the boat before the chest then you don't get the chest coins when you should. Also you have to go through two steps to restart a level when it should be made as fast and easy as possible. The fact that you can just buy items with real money that make finishing any level easy also hurts the overall play experience imo.
They did a great job bringing this to Android. I like the level design and game mechanics. Also, the IAP system is perfect. It fits those pay to win people without crippling us hardcore puzzlers!

*****Unknown error code during installation 960. Ive tried to update 6 times. Please help. *******   Like game style. Takes a ton of system resources. Freezes a lot. I have to reset game every few mins or restart phone
It's fun and also quite challenging if you want to achieve everything. I can recommend playing it on a tablet, it's barely playable on a nexus 5.

To buy tgis game so here I am. Hooefully I wont be disappointed ")

this game is fun! Just spent 3 entire nights finishing the beast, and I was thoroughly entertained, unable to stop playing until 2am. Every level poses a unique challenge, especially the later ones. Humorous, well polished, very fun. There are powerups you can buy, I finished without using one but they sure would have helped! lots of bonus missions too, good replay value. Highly recommend.
Does Not Work on Restricted Profiles

I love this game and I have never stopped playing it. But I have found a few occasions when the game crashes, if I lock my tablet while playing the game and then unlock my tablet it will freeze, if I restart a level too much the game will freeze when I press the settings button sometimes, when I load the app from the task manager it will freeze and be unplayable. If I close the app the only way I can play it is if I close it from the task manager and re run it. This is fine but it would be nice if it was fixed.
Icebreaker was one of the first flash games I ever played as a kid and the fact that this is now a full game blows my mind after how far Nitrome has gotten in the last several years.
But can't move it to internal memory
Best puzzle game I have played in a long time great work keep on making more levels! :)
replyContent: Are you unhappy because the game crashed or do you just not like the game? If it is because of a crash please be aware that the game will be updated in the next few hours to address the crashes that have been reported.

content: Yes, i said fun
Almost perfect.

The game itself is great- it's funny, challenging and the level designs are great. But it freezes  while opening after the Nitrome intro and while trying to go to the pause menu in a level. Maybe it's my phone, or maybe the new update will fix it.
As of a few days ago this game will no longer start it comes up with the nitcom screen then straight back to home screen, galaxy s3 4G

I love the art; you can double tap to zoom in to see the game in better detail which is a nice feature.  The humor is great and ACHIEVMENTS! I'm giving it a 4 and not a 5 because I don't like the in app purchases the fact that they have them is annoying and the prices are very high

Great game for .99. However, the in-app purchases are kind of annoying. You don't have to buy them but Nitrome really pushes them. It kinda feels like they're being pushed down my throat. Also, the game is plenty long but I wish it was split up into more worlds because The Kraken is really weak compared to the others and I'm not having fun with it.
One of my favorite games on the computer when I was younger, and now one of my favorite games on my phone!
Realy bad
Retro styling. Clever puzzles. Funny dialogue. Get it!
A little pricey, but AMAZING!
Only complaint is how long this port took
Great idea and implementation. Pity about the ads when the game is paused, which detracts from the overall look and feel of the game. Especially since this is a paid version of the game.
Perfect game. Very long and very awesome story. Very funny
I'm looking forward for more play, since nitrome had its own unique collection.
Good
Finally on android
Friends think its gay, I like it!

This is a real quality game, and not the usual mindless endless runner or games driven by IAP. This game is truely a breath of fresh air, even the dialogues are done right, and I find myself smiling from time to time. When I contacted the developer he answered within an hour.  I really hope this game gets a sequel, I would differently be ready to back it up through a kickstarter if that's necessary.

I'm caught between a block of ice and a hammer here. It's a beautiful game that's very responsive, but it has ads and IAPs. IAPs I don't mind too much, but the ads are going overboard. Also consider the price of this game is going to go up. Devs are asking you to pay, pay again then watch ads like you didn't pay.
Charge me five or six bucks for the game if you want money but don't charge fee to install then charge in app purchases to play. Refunded .

I've been waiting forever for this game, and I'm glad to say, I was not disappointed in the slightest. Totally worth the wait. The levels are challenging, the gameplay rocks and the humour is awesomely viking-ish.
Really good addictive game. Unfortunately all golden coins are being delisted every now and than.
This game is like crack to me.

Played this on my iPod until I sold my iPod, but it's still pretty good. When you get to Underwell, the game has slight audio cuts and issues, might want to look into that.
Not going to play a game i paid for when there are ads. Reject.
OM NOM NOM NOM NOM NOM
Paid, installed, phone kept crashing, uninstalled, phone fine, I want  refund please!!!
Ads and in app purchases after purchasing the game. Seriously go away

Game is pretty good but there's a bunch of content locked behind expensive in-app purchases. Did I buy half a video game? I guess so.   There's also ads. That blows my mind. And this stuff isn't evident until it's too late and the refund period is over. Oh well. Live and learn I guess.

Loved the flash games and this is an excellent game that keeps the spirit of the flash games.  Thanks for delivering an excellent game Nitrome, although it would've been nice if it was released along with iOS.  One small request , please use the immersive mode on KitKat.
This is one of the best Nitrome games,finally on Android! Great work,Nitrome!
Great artwork!

Great game!
I've been waiting ages for this. Great gameplay, controls, music, and over all great experience!

replyContent: We have just submitted an update to the store which will fix this issue. Sorry this happened and I hope that you enjoy the game once the update hits in the next few hours. Please if you do enjoy the game consider updating your review to reflect the fix.

content: U have to buy this worth every $

Wow Im impressed. I hope you guys make millions you deserve it. Also love the game. :)

content: Games this good are rare, hope there will be more levels added in future, willing to pay for them too... Great going Nitrome..

I hope that you will then enjoy our game...please accept our appologies for the crash and if you enjoy the game following the update please consider revising your review.

Good game like the 6.2 model on mini clip
replyContent: Do you not like the game? You say 'Good Game' and 'Great' so maybe you hit the wrong star rating. If so please consider updating your review to reflect this as we want others to feel comfortable buying our app and a lot of people look to the review score for this.

content: I'm glad the developer self published this app.
replyContent: The game is published by the developer Nitrome and not Rovio who no longer have anything to do with the game. Alongside the Android launch we released a whole new level pack 'Kraken' for free so we are not charging people for new content! Please consider revising your review.

content: Getting 100% 5 ratings itself is a big task. This game looks good and physics is good too. Hope i will enjoy it.
Nice game.  Only a move to SD Card option would be welcome.
replyContent: Hi Suneel, thanks for the suggestion. Our focus was on making the game as small as possible so that it would not impact on peoples memory but being able to move it to SD is a good idea so we might consider it for a future update if we get enough support. Thanks for your review.

content: And it worths it.
I've been waiting for this game to be released on Android. It was worth the wait.   I thought Ravio was releasing this game, but oh well.
Fantastic game from one of the best.  Lots of meaty gameplay here, with intuitive controls and some challenging puzzles.  The Android version is every bit as good as the iOS one.
Woohoo for Icebreaker...   I'm really tired...it won't let me go to bed..
I have lots of fun playing this game.  Waited for release for Android since I changed from iPhone to my Samsung.  Glad it finally happened.  Great game.
I've always loved this game and it's great now too! Even better
Thank you devs. I was been waiting this for a while to come to Android! And now I am really enjoying it!
I love nitrome so much. I've  been waiting for this game for so long now.  It's amazing :)

A fantastic game!! I've been waiting for this to come to Android for a long time now, and it's here! I played the heck out of the browser versions years ago, and this does not disappoint!  Icebreaker is just a joy to play, smart, funny, great pixel graphics, and from the looks of it, days of fun! Thank you Nitrome!
